openai_results.raw_text:
SYNDICATED LOAN AGREEMENT
THIS SYNDICATED LOAN AGREEMENT (this "Agreement") is made and entered into as of
October 28, 2024, by and among:
TECH INNOVATIONS INC., a Delaware corporation, having its principal place of business at
123 Innovation Drive, San Francisco, CA 94105 (the "Borrower");
FIRST NATIONAL BANK, as Administrative Agent and Lead Arranger (the "Administrative
Agent"); and
THE LENDERS listed in Schedule A hereto (collectively, the "Lenders").
ARTICLE I: DEFINITIONS
1.1 "Consolidated EBITDA" means, for any period, consolidated net income plus interest
expense, income tax expense, depreciation, and amortization.
1.2 "Leverage Ratio" means, as of any date of determination, the ratio of (a) Total Debt to (b)
Consolidated EBITDA for the trailing twelve months.
1.3 "Interest Coverage Ratio" means the ratio of (a) Consolidated EBITDA to (b) Interest
Expense.
ARTICLE II: THE CREDITS
2.1 The Lenders hereby establish a revolving credit facility in favor of the Borrower in the
aggregate principal amount of USD 50,000,000 (the "Facility").
2.2 Interest Rate: SOFR + 2.50% per annum
ARTICLE III: FINANCIAL COVENANTS
The Borrower covenants and agrees that, so long as any Commitment is in effect and until
payment in full of all Obligations:
3.1 Leverage Ratio: The Borrower shall maintain a Leverage Ratio not exceeding:
- 3.50:1.00 for any fiscal quarter ending during the period from the Closing Date through
December 31, 2024- 3.25:1.00 for any fiscal quarter ending during the period from January 1, 2025, through
December 31, 2025
- 3.00:1.00 for any fiscal quarter thereafter
3.2 Interest Coverage Ratio: The Borrower shall maintain an Interest Coverage Ratio of not
less than 3.00:1.00 as of the end of any fiscal quarter.
3.3 Minimum Liquidity: The Borrower shall maintain minimum Liquidity of not less than USD
10,000,000 at all times.
ARTICLE IV: NEGATIVE COVENANTS
The Borrower covenants that it shall not, directly or indirectly:
4.1 Capital Expenditures: Make or commit to make capital expenditures in any fiscal year
exceeding USD 25,000,000 in aggregate.
4.2 Distributions: Declare or pay any dividends or make any distributions on its capital stock if
the Leverage Ratio exceeds 2.75:1.00.
4.3 Additional Indebtedness: Incur additional indebtedness exceeding USD 10,000,000 in
aggregate without prior written consent from the Administrative Agent.
ARTICLE V: REPORTING REQUIREMENTS
5.1 The Borrower shall furnish to the Administrative Agent:
(a) Within 45 days after the end of each fiscal quarter: - Consolidated financial statements -
Calculation of all financial covenants - Compliance certificate signed by the CFO
(b) Within 90 days after the end of each fiscal year: - Audited annual financial statements -
Independent auditor's report - Annual budget and projections
5.2 The Borrower shall promptly notify the Administrative Agent of any Default or Event of
Default.
ARTICLE VI: EVENTS OF DEFAULT
6.1 Each of the following shall constitute an Event of Default:
(a) Failure to pay principal, interest, or any other amount when due (b) Breach of any financial
covenant (c) Breach of any negative covenant (d) Material misrepresentation (e) Cross-default
to other material indebtedness (f) Bankruptcy or insolvencyIN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Agreement to be executed as of
the date first written above.
TECH INNOVATIONS INC. By: _______________________ Name: Sarah Johnson Title: Chief
Financial Officer
FIRST NATIONAL BANK, as Administrative Agent By: _______________________ Name:
Michael Chen Title: Senior Vice President
[LENDER SIGNATURES FOLLOW]
Schedule A: Lenders
1. First National Bank - $20,000,000
2. Pacific Western Bank - $15,000,000
3. Silicon Valley Credit Union - $15,000,000
